            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【欧洲疫情蔓延 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AC%A7%E8%B6%B3%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F%E5%A4%9A%E9%A1%B9%E8%B5%9B%E4%BA%8B%23&amp;from=default">#欧足联推迟多项赛事#</a>】当地时间23日，欧足联正式决定，推迟原定于2020年5月进行的女子冠军联赛决赛、欧洲联赛决赛和欧洲冠军联赛决赛。赛事再次举办的时间尚未公布。（总台记者薛婧萌） ​​​​                                            </div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">

    </ul>

    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                    </div>

    </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4485900983882796" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IA2FYgi5K?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-24 07:20" date="1585005601000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485900983882796:fromprofile"> 3月24日 07:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%8525%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#中国以外确诊病例超25万#</a>】世卫组织统计数据显示，截至欧洲中部时间23日18时（北京时间24日1时），全球确诊新冠肺炎334981例，死亡14510例。中国以外新冠肺炎确诊病例超过25万例。（总台记者朱赫） ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4485897241756094" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IA2zW7mQ6?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-24 07:05" date="1585004709000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485897241756094:fromprofile"> 3月24日 07:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B3%95%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A19856%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#法国累计确诊19856例#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B3%95%E5%9B%BD%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E3176%E4%BE%8B%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%23&amp;from=default">#法国单日新增3176例确诊#</a>】据法国卫生部，截至23日19时，法国新冠病毒感染病例24小时新增3176例，总数达到19856人。而由新冠病毒感染死亡病例24小时增加186例，总数达到860例。法国现有8675名感染者在接受住院治疗，比前一日多了1435人，其中2082人在接受重症监护。（总台记者 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IA2zW7mQ6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485897241756094:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485897241756094&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609352750&amp;ssig=qjfo%2F69VN%2B" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4485895535552925" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IA2xbnizj?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-24 06:58" date="1585004302000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485895535552925:fromprofile"> 3月24日 06:58</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E5%A5%A5%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E5%A7%94%E5%91%98%E7%A7%B0%E4%B8%9C%E4%BA%AC%E5%A5%A5%E8%BF%90%E5%B0%86%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F%23&amp;from=default">#国际奥委会委员称东京奥运将推迟#</a>】据美国媒体报道，资深国际奥委会委员迪克·庞德当地时间23日透露，2020年东京奥运会将推迟，有关细节将在未来四周内制定。庞德说：“根据国际奥委会提供的信息，已决定推迟（东京奥运会）。尚不确定推迟的具体计划，但（东京）奥运会将不会在7月24日开始，这就是我 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IA2xbnizj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485895535552925:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485895535552925&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4485894860157689" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IA2w60F1n?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-24 06:55" date="1585004141000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485894860157689:fromprofile"> 3月24日 06:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A63927%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利累计确诊63927例#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4789%E4%BE%8B%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%23&amp;from=default">#意大利单日新增4789例确诊#</a>】 截至当地时间23日18时，意大利累计新冠肺炎确诊病例63927例，24小时新增4789例。累计死亡6077例，治愈7432例。现存确诊50418例，其中3204人正接受重症监护治疗。（总台记者 殷欣） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4485789226583446" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzZLIrCEC?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 23:55" date="1584978956000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485789226583446:fromprofile"> 3月23日 23:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A5%E6%AD%A5%E4%B8%BA%E8%90%A5%E6%89%8D%E8%83%BD%E9%80%90%E6%AD%A5%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#步步为营才能逐步清零#</a> 】郭志坚：结合全球疫情大流行的形势，中央明确<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E9%98%B2%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%86%85%E9%98%B2%E5%8F%8D%E5%BC%B9%23&amp;from=default">#外防输入内防反弹#</a>的防控策略。之前的八字策略是“外防输入，内防扩散”，从防扩散到防反弹，两字之变也说明疫情形势发生了明显改变。面对散发病例和局部风险，一旦发现疫情就要进行精准管控。步步为营，散发病例就会逐步清零 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzZLIrCEC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485789226583446:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485789226583446&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=1962013463&amp;cid=4485789784336600&amp;nick=死了都要淘&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【英国民众：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E6%89%80%E8%B0%93%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E7%9A%84%E8%AF%B4%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%88%E8%A0%A2%23&amp;from=default">#特朗普所谓中国病毒的说法很蠢#</a>】对于美国总统特朗普使用“中国病毒”的污名化称谓，英国伦敦的民众直言：“这是世界性的流行病，在哪里都暴发，不只是中国的病毒”；“这太荒唐了！病毒有特定的名字，科学定义的名字”；“这个说法挺蠢的，没有证据表明病毒到底来自哪里”……来看↓&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzZHM4DXH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485786781106929:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485786781106929&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【美国<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BA%BD%E7%BA%A6%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E4%BA%BA%E6%95%B0%E8%B6%851%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#纽约市新冠肺炎确诊人数超1万#</a>】根据纽约市政府数据，当地时间3月22日晚，纽约市新冠肺炎确诊人数达到10764人，纽约市成为全美首个也是目前唯一一个新冠肺炎确诊人数突破1万的城市。（总台记者徐德智） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                        <div comment_id="4485775153966552" node-type="root_comment" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%99%BD%E5%B2%A9%E6%9D%BE%E8%AF%B4%E4%B8%8D%E7%9E%92%E6%8A%A5%E6%89%8D%E6%98%AF%E7%9C%9F%E6%AD%A3%E8%AE%B2%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%23&amp;from=default">#白岩松说不瞒报才是真正讲政治#</a>】白岩松：面对国内的疫情，数据依然是0让人高兴。但有人担心，为了确保0，会不会有些数字不那么真实？有些单位或机构会不会推卸责任？这种担心不过分，甚至可以变成一种监督。如果以为不科学地死守住0就是讲政治，这种看法是错误的。不谎报、不瞒报、科学防控才是真 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzZ2TknT0" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485761434858382:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485761434858382&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4485761842265393&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=2249872265&amp;commentmid=4485761434858382" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>301</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">3月23日 22:07</div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%B6%853.5%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国确诊新冠肺炎超3.5万例#</a>】根据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学统计的数据，截至北京时间今天16点，美国累计确诊病例达到35224例，累计死亡病例471例。纽约州、华盛顿州和加利福尼亚州都已被宣布为“重大灾区”。其中，纽约州的<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BA%BD%E7%BA%A6%E5%B8%82%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E5%8D%A0%E5%85%A8%E7%BE%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%BA%A6%E4%B8%89%E5%88%86%E4%B9%8B%E4%B8%80%23&amp;from=default">#纽约市累计确诊占全美确诊约三分之一#</a>。纽约州长表示，还未从美国国会通过 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzYBsbawz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485744422662067:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485744422662067&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4485745034832866&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=6329638689&amp;commentmid=4485744422662067" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>4004</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">3月23日 21:00</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->

                                <a name="4485740459441451" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzYv3DC9t?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 20:42" date="1584967329000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485740459441451:fromprofile"> 3月23日 20:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【过命之交！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%AD%9D%E6%84%9F%E5%B8%82%E6%B0%91%E6%B2%BF%E8%B7%AF%E9%80%81%E5%88%AB%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E5%91%98%23&amp;from=default">#湖北孝感市民沿路送别医疗队员#</a>】今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%AD%9D%E6%84%9F%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E8%B8%8F%E4%B8%8A%E8%BF%94%E7%A8%8B%23&amp;from=default">#重庆支援湖北孝感医疗队踏上返程#</a>。前往机场的路上，孝感市民挥舞国旗、举着横幅，自发前来送行；沿路的车辆，也鸣笛向队员们表达谢意；一位小女孩还来到队员们的车上唱起了歌：“谢谢你，感谢有你，把幸福传递……”<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B0%A2%E8%B0%A2%E4%BD%A0%E4%B8%BA%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E6%8B%BC%E8%BF%87%E5%91%BD%23&amp;from=default">#谢谢你为湖北拼过命#</a>！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzYv3DC9t" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485740459441451:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485740459441451&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6526922680&amp;cid=4485743562710003&amp;nick=要做顾子熹的腿部挂件&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4485728694410824" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzYc5ivsk?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 19:55" date="1584964524000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485728694410824:fromprofile"> 3月23日 19:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        中央对防疫形势的最新判断：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E5%B7%B2%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E9%98%BB%E6%96%AD%23&amp;from=default">#全国本土疫情传播已基本阻断#</a>，全球疫情大流行下要<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E9%98%B2%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%86%85%E9%98%B2%E5%8F%8D%E5%BC%B9%23&amp;from=default">#外防输入内防反弹#</a>！转起周知！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                <a name="4485726316208738" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzY8fq3aW?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 19:45" date="1584963957000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485726316208738:fromprofile"> 3月23日 19:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【中央：以武汉为主战场的<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E5%B7%B2%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E9%98%BB%E6%96%AD%23&amp;from=default">#全国本土疫情传播已基本阻断#</a>】中央应对新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组会议指出：当前，以武汉为主战场的全国本土疫情传播基本阻断，但零星散发病例和局部暴发疫情风险仍然存在，结合全球疫情大流行形势，要实行<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E9%98%B2%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%86%85%E9%98%B2%E5%8F%8D%E5%BC%B9%23&amp;from=default">#外防输入内防反弹#</a>防控策略。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4485726316208738:1034-video:1034%3A4485726192992291:page_100206_home:2656274875:4485726316208738:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zkwq5V" alt="http://t.cn/A6zkwq5V" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%95%B0%E9%87%8F%E8%B6%853%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙新冠肺炎患者数量超3万例#</a>】据西班牙卫生部，截至西班牙时间23日11时40分，新冠肺炎患者全国确诊数据增至33089例，死亡2182例。（总台记者魏帆） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2656274875&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4485712189513831"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>415</em></span></span></span></a>

                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E4%B8%BB%E6%92%AD%E5%96%8A%E8%AF%9D%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E5%88%AB%E6%8E%A8%E5%8D%B8%E8%B4%A3%E4%BB%BB%23&amp;from=default">#美主播喊话特朗普别推卸责任#</a>：敌人是病毒不是中国！】近日，针对<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E8%AE%B2%E8%AF%9D%E7%A8%BF%E5%B0%86%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%94%B9%E4%B8%BA%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#特朗普讲话稿将新冠病毒改为中国病毒#</a>，美国CNN主播在节目中提出批评：“这么做能帮到谁？我们不需要敌人，我们有共同的敌人，它就是病毒！特朗普没必要推卸责任了。我们知道我们是怎么走到这一步的。这与中国无关，而在于我们自己 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzXATxRmv" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485705638069951:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485705638069951&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4485701754408793" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzXuDiuVz?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 18:08" date="1584958101000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485701754408793:fromprofile"> 3月23日 18:08</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IzXuDiuVz&amp;mid=4485701754408793&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>413</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4485698033489804" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzXoDeDRa?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 17:53" date="1584957214000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485698033489804:fromprofile"> 3月23日 17:53</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E4%BC%AF%E7%A4%BC%E8%AF%B4%E4%B8%AD%E8%8D%AF%E6%8E%A8%E5%B9%BF%E9%9D%A0%E6%95%88%E6%9E%9C%23&amp;from=default">#张伯礼说中药推广靠效果#</a>】中国工程院院士张伯礼：一开始，在武汉社区发放中药并不顺利，武汉13个区第一天只发放了3000多袋药，但两三天后发放量就达一万多袋；江夏方舱医院采取了中医药为主的综合治疗，564名患者无一转为重症，后来推广至十几个方舱医院一万多患者，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E8%8D%AF%E6%98%BE%E8%91%97%E9%99%8D%E4%BD%8E%E8%BD%BB%E7%97%87%E8%BD%AC%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E6%AF%94%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#中药显著降低轻症转重症比例#</a> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzXoDeDRa" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485698033489804:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485698033489804&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609352759&amp;ssig=XtcnOsgsE7" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4485693503846415" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzXhkg8CX?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 17:35" date="1584956134000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485693503846415:fromprofile"> 3月23日 17:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%80%BF%E7%88%BD%E8%AF%B4%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E8%B4%BC%E5%96%8A%E6%8D%89%E8%B4%BC%E6%8A%8A%E6%88%8F%E5%A4%AA%E6%8B%99%E5%8A%A3%23&amp;from=default">#耿爽说美国贼喊捉贼把戏太拙劣#</a>】据美媒披露，美国白宫国安会要求各联邦机构统一口径，对外宣称是中国策划掩盖疫情导致全球大流行。外交部发言人耿爽：我不禁要问，到底是谁在散布虚假信息？是谁在混淆视听、颠倒黑白？美方这种造谣污蔑、贼喊捉贼的把戏实在太拙劣了。我要再次敦促美方，集中精力做 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzXhkg8CX" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485693503846415:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485693503846415&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4485685090545177" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzX3L2hPb?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 17:02" date="1584954128000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485685090545177:fromprofile"> 3月23日 17:02</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E4%B8%BB%E5%B9%B2%E9%81%93%E6%92%A4%E5%8D%A1%E5%90%8E%E8%BD%A6%E6%B5%81%E5%A2%9E%E5%8A%A0%23&amp;from=default">#武汉主干道撤卡后车流增加#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/9f/2018new_jiayou_org.png" title="[加油]" alt="[加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】20日起，进出武汉的防疫检查点保留，武汉城区主干道已陆续撤卡，路上车流量明显增加。目前，持有通行证的武汉居民，向社区备案过的、有特殊需求的居民可开车上路。此外，符合健康条件的外地返汉人员经申请也可开车回家。网友：一起都在慢慢好起来，武汉加油！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzX3L2hPb" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485685090545177:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485685090545177&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【北京：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%9C%A8%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%96%E6%9B%BE%E4%B8%8D%E6%88%B4%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E9%80%9B%E8%A1%97%E8%81%9A%E9%A4%90%23&amp;from=default">#输入病例在国外曾不戴口罩逛街聚餐#</a>】北京市疾控中心副主任庞星火：22日北京新增境外输入10例。①确诊病例来源仍集中于欧美国家，其中英国4例、西班牙2例、法国2例、美国1例、巴基斯坦1例；②<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%B0%E5%B7%B4%E5%9F%BA%E6%96%AF%E5%9D%A6%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#北京首次发现巴基斯坦输入病例#</a>；③很多境外输入病例都存在逛街等外出情况，且不戴口罩，仍存在聚 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzWO1zg15" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485675338403051:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485675338403051&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4485667121789582" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzWAM7vye?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 15:50" date="1584949843000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485667121789582:fromprofile"> 3月23日 15:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【重温珍贵画面！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%BC10%E6%88%98%E6%9C%BA22%E5%B2%81%23&amp;from=default">#歼10战机22岁#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】22年前的今天，歼-10首飞成功。中国因此成为世界上第五个能够自主研制第三代战机的国家。那天，歼-10总设计师宋文骢说，“从今天起，我的生日就是3月23日”！现在，歼-10已发展成为歼-10A、歼-10B、歼-10C系列战机。今天，重温，纪念！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4485667121789582:1034-video:1034%3A4437492460665780:page_100206_home:2656274875:4485667121789582:2656274875" title="央视军事的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/AirbCgBX" alt="http://t.cn/AirbCgBX" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视军事的微博视频</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzWAM7vye" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485667121789582:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485667121789582&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IzWAM7vye&amp;mid=4485667121789582&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>1773</em></span></span></span></a>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E5%B0%86%E5%85%A8%E9%9D%A2%E6%81%A2%E5%A4%8D%E7%94%9F%E4%BA%A7%E7%94%9F%E6%B4%BB%E7%A7%A9%E5%BA%8F%23&amp;from=default">#浙江将全面恢复生产生活秩序#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E8%B0%83%E6%95%B4%E5%BA%94%E6%80%A5%E5%93%8D%E5%BA%94%E7%BA%A7%E5%88%AB%E4%B8%BA%E4%B8%89%E7%BA%A7%23&amp;from=default">#浙江调整应急响应级别为三级#</a>】自2月22日以来，浙江省已连续30天无本地新增病例；3月22日，实现本地确诊病例“清零”。省委省政府研究决定，将浙江省新冠肺炎疫情防控应急响应级别由二级响应调整为三级响应。在切实防止疫情反弹的前提下，全面恢复生产生活秩序。（总台 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzWw0jNnV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485664164718071:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485664164718071&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4485660063276429" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzWpodKlD?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 15:22" date="1584948161000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485660063276429:fromprofile"> 3月23日 15:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【警惕！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%A3%E5%8F%91%E6%88%96%E8%81%9A%E9%9B%86%E6%80%A7%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E9%9A%90%E6%82%A3%E4%BB%8D%E5%AD%98%E5%9C%A8%23&amp;from=default">#散发或聚集性病例隐患仍存在#</a>】国家卫健委新闻发言人米锋：目前，武汉关闭离汉通道已满2个月，湖北和武汉连续5天无新增确诊病例和疑似病例，现有病例数持续下降。但零新增不等于零风险，疫情防控任务依然艰巨繁重。随着全球病例不断增加，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%9A%E5%9B%BD%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E5%9C%A8%E5%AE%B6%E4%B8%AD%E8%87%AA%E6%88%91%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#多国要求个人在家中自我隔离#</a>，中方将继续加强疫情防 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzWpodKlD" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485660063276429:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485660063276429&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%E6%8B%92%E7%BB%9D%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%89%80%E8%B0%93%E6%8F%B4%E5%8A%A9%E6%8F%90%E8%AE%AE%23&amp;from=default">#伊朗拒绝美国所谓援助提议#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%93%88%E6%A2%85%E5%86%85%E4%BC%8A%E7%A7%B0%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E7%95%99%E7%9D%80%E8%87%AA%E5%B7%B1%E7%94%A8%E5%90%A7%23&amp;from=default">#哈梅内伊称医疗物资美国留着自己用吧#</a>】伊朗最高领袖哈梅内伊22日向全国发表讲话时表示，“美国愿援助伊朗抗击疫情”的提议让人感到奇怪，伊朗不会接受。他还指出美国国内当前医疗物资短缺，相比帮助别人，不如留给自己用。如果美国真心想帮伊朗，应立即取消制裁。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzWhhyPQA" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485655038302456:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485655038302456&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6455112302" usercard="id=6455112302">杭州三三集团沉冤</a>：根据《最高人民法院关于审理非法集资刑事案件具体应用法律若干问题的解释》之规定第三条：非法吸收或者变相吸收公众存款，主要用于正常的生产经营活动，能够及时清退所吸收资金，可以免予刑事处罚；情节显著轻微的，不作为犯罪处理。非法集资案件资产清退成功案例举不胜举。        </div>

                                <a name="4485644854443824" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IzW0RiE2A?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-23 14:22" date="1584944535000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4485644854443824:fromprofile"> 3月23日 14:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【国家市场监管总局：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%AC%A6%E5%90%88%E8%A7%84%E5%AE%9A%E4%B8%AA%E4%BD%93%E5%B7%A5%E5%95%86%E6%88%B7%E6%97%A0%E9%9C%80%E6%89%B9%E5%87%86%E5%8D%B3%E5%8F%AF%E8%90%A5%E4%B8%9A%23&amp;from=default">#符合规定个体工商户无需批准即可营业#</a>】国家市场监管总局副局长孙梅君：我国登记在册的个体工商户有8353万户，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E4%B8%AA%E4%BD%93%E5%B7%A5%E5%95%86%E6%88%B7%E5%B8%A6%E5%8A%A8%E7%BA%A62%E4%BA%BF%E4%BA%BA%E5%B0%B1%E4%B8%9A%23&amp;from=default">#我国个体工商户带动约2亿人就业#</a>。国家市场监管总局出台了财税、金融、社保、租金减免等支持政策，如符合各地复工复产规定的个体工商户，无需批准就可依法开展经营活 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IzW0RiE2A" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4485644854443824:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4485644854443824&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【直播！总台记者直击澳大利亚、日本、印度疫情动态】目前，澳大利亚的餐馆等场所已关闭，百姓生活受到什么影响？ <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%80%8D%E8%A1%A8%E7%A4%BA%E8%8B%A5%E4%B8%8D%E8%83%BD%E5%AE%8C%E6%95%B4%E4%B8%BE%E5%8A%9E%E5%A5%A5%E8%BF%90%E5%B0%86%E8%80%83%E8%99%91%E5%BB%B6%E6%9C%9F%23&amp;from=default">#安倍表示若不能完整举办奥运将考虑延期#</a>，各方有何反应？印度宣布在全国75个地区 “封区”，目前情况如何？记者带你直击↓关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4485643163452196:1042152-live:1042152%3A995916be4999634f9463944701b32548" title="央视新闻的微博直播" href="http://t.cn/A6zDbByB" alt="http://t.cn/A6zDbByB" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>央视新闻的微博直播</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">3月23日 14:30</div>

                                                                                  【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" suda-data=\"key=tblog_home_new&value=feed_time:4485897241756094:fromprofile\"> 3月24日 07:05<\/a> 来自 <a class=\"S_txt2\" suda-uatrack=\"key=profile_feed&value=pubfrom_guest\" action-type=\"app_source\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"央视新闻\">\n                                                                                                                        <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%B3%95%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A19856%E4%BE%8B%23&from=default\">#法国累计确诊19856例#<\/a>【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%B3%95%E5%9B%BD%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E3176%E4%BE%8B%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%23&from=default\">#法国单日新增3176例确诊#<\/a>】据法国卫生部，截至23日19时，法国新冠病毒感染病例24小时新增3176例，总数达到19856人。而由新冠病毒感染死亡病例24小时增加186例，总数达到860例。法国现有8675名感染者在接受住院治疗，比前一日多了1435人，其中2082人在接受重症监护。（总台记者 】郭志坚：结合全球疫情大流行的形势，中央明确<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"
